summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 4 and 5 of Tracts 1 and 16, all of Tracts 2, 15 and 6 to 11 inclusive, Block A; Tracts 1 to 5 inclusive, and 22 to 26 inclusive, Block B; Lots 4 to 56, Block C; all of Block D; and Lots 2 to 62, Block H, Georgetown; Blocks 1 and 2, Horton Investment Company's First Addition; Block 9, Horton's Second Addition, and Block 1, Sweeney's Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-76 and 17-48, respectively.
